name: Route4Me
tag_list: navigation, route-planning, logistics, geolocation, routing, telematics, fleet-optimization, fleet-management
overview:
Route4Me lets users enter up to 200 addresses and will re-organize all of them in the best order trying millions or billions of combinations to find the best route sequence for you. Most routes are usually 25%-35% shorter after optimization.

Using a proprietary algorithm and easy-to-use web, iPhone, and iPad applications Route4Me lets individuals and small businesses plan their routes by optimizing them.

Route4Me’s unique route optimizer gives full reporting and analysis of routes traveled, mileage and gas saved, route cost estimation, among other advanced features.

Route4Me is available for free to individuals or small businesses who plan trips smaller than 10 stops, and as a paid subscription service to users with more demanding trip sizes.
